      • getModuleConfiguration

        public Object getModuleConfiguration(String module_configuracion_name)
                              throws GB_Exception
        This method find a module configuration by name.
        Parameters:
        module_configuracion_name - String configuration´s name.
        Returns:
        Object a value of configuration.
        Throws:
        GB_Exception - if:
        1. The configuration have more than one item
        2. The configuration doesnt exist in database

        public boolean isAWorkingDay(Date day)
                      throws GB_Exception
        Return if the date is working day.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
